Params: {3: 'The Construct holds up his shield, but it proves useless against Alpha. Her blade sifts through the air, and the very next instant, the Construct is already in two pieces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: "Don't panic! It's just one enemy. Circle 'round her, now!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The sight of their fallen comrades do not dishearten the Constructs, instead, it seems to be inspiring the others.'}
{3: "Heeding their leader's command, the Constructs quickly surround Alpha. This white-haired Ascendant is the target of their mission, and the Constructs are ready to do anything to defeat her."}
{3: "At their leader's cue, the Constructs ready their weapons for a concerted assault and close in on Alpha."}
{3: 'Unfazed in the slightest, Alpha merely twists her blade in one minimal flourish before returning it to its sheath.'}
{3: 'Like their comrades before them, their fate is sealed the moment they met Alpha.'}
{3: 'Not a single explosion—the cut has steered clear of the volatile core components of the Constructs. Their metallic frames groan before crumbling to the ground, and life becomes matter.'}
{3: 'A predestined result. Chance plays no part.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'She single-handedly wiped out all the vanguard squads...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't think it's necessary at this point...", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Alpha senses the arrival of the belated guests.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Gray Raven...? I was wondering if I'd ever see you again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alpha, what do you have to gain from slaughtering your own kind?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'My own kind...? Interesting way to put it, Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia inches toward Alpha cautiously, blade in hand. Alpha calmly smiles off this encroaching threat.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are they not? Those Constructs you cut down there, they were your comrades, our comrades! Why did you become like this?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lucia's exclamation answers a question that has long been hanging on everyone's mind. Some time ago, Lucia has already—"}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'When did you find out...? And, do you ask of me, or yourself, "Lucia"?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "During the time in the arctics, I already knew that I wasn't the real me. And fighting with you again, I realized that...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Your moves, the way you handle your blade—you are the real Lucia... aren't you?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Commandant, we must stop the Corrupted here from advancing further. If we occupy this bridge, we can bottleneck their advance.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't worry about me, Commandant. Focus on the battle.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I won't. Lee, Liv, ready your weapons!", 4: '3'}
